title: Orders for a given user_id
sql: SELECT id, user_id, total_amount, created_at FROM Orders WHERE user_id = :user_id

title: Order items for a given order_id
sql: SELECT id, order_id, product_id, quantity, unit_price FROM OrderItems WHERE order_id = :order_id

title: Public product reviews (no filter)
sql: SELECT id, product_id, rating, title, body FROM Reviews

title: Product catalog (id, name, price)
sql: SELECT id, name, price FROM Products
